author: Andrew Beaton
title: Shaquem Griffin Is the Star of the NFL Combine
text:
The most remarkable story at this year’s NFL Scouting Combine comes from a college star and folk hero who wasn’t even supposed to be at the pre-draft event in the first place.
Shaquem Griffin, who lost his left hand at the age of 4 because of a rare pre-birth condition, was a notable omission on the combine’s original list of attendees. He was a star at Central Florida, where he was the Peach Bowl Defensive MVP against Auburn to cap the Knights’ undefeated season.
...
